name: CASE 27
description:
Case 27 is a fnaf style point-and-click/first-person horror game.  In this game, you will take the place of 19-year-old Jacqueline Moore, who just applied for the position of a night guard at Ralph's PlayPlace. After working a few shifts, you quickly realize that there is something wrong,  and decide to start investigating.  What you find is beyond what you had imagined.

Features:

  • Intense fnaf office style gameplay
  • New gameplay mechanics every night
  • WASD investigate mode
  • Lots of jumpscares!

State of Development:

This game is still in a very early stage, and a playable build will not be available for a while. The office gameplay is mostly completed, and the investigate mode is still far from finished. This is the first game I've ever seriously worked on, so development will take a while.
